attributes.action: Invalidate the EU referendum result due to Leave campaign lies
attributes.additional_details:
Full Fact
https://fullfact.org/europe/


Nigel Farage MEP admitting NHS funding lie
http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2016/06/24/nigel-farage-350-million-pledge-to-fund-the-nhs-was-a-mistake/
attributes.background: The figure of £350m per week cost to the UK doesn't include the UK rebate & other benefits. Nigel Farage now says he isn't able to say this figure, quoted on leave propaganda, will be NHS money. Lies told throughout a hateful campaign have affected the public's ability to make an informed choice.
